1{-# LANGUAGE ScopedTypeVariables #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Term-content operator.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Data.Church.Cop
7  ( -- * Operator
8    Cop (..), CopCox, CopTree, copName, 
9  
10    -- * Operator name
11    copNormal, copInternal, copPrefix, copInfix, copPostfix,
12  
13    -- * Operator set
14    CopSet (..), CopFind,
15    copsetFill,
16    GetCops (..),
17  ) where
18
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture         as O
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base             as B
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax           as S
22import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Church.Cox  as D
23
24
25-- ----------------------  Operator
26
27-- | Term-content operator.
28data Cop c
29    = CopCalc S.BlankName (D.CopCalc c)     -- ^ Convert @c@ (content)
30    | CopCox  S.BlankName (CopCox c)        -- ^ Convert 'D.Cox' c
31    | CopTree S.BlankName (CopTree S.Chars) -- ^ Convert 'B.TTree'
32
33-- | Expression-level syntax.
34type CopCox c = [D.Cox c] -> D.AbCox c
35
36-- | Tree-level syntax.
37type CopTree t = [S.TTree t] -> B.Ab (S.TTree t)
38
39instance Show (Cop c) where
40    show (CopCalc n _) = "(CopCalc " ++ show n ++ " _)"
41    show (CopCox  n _) = "(CopCox "  ++ show n ++ " _)"
42    show (CopTree n _) = "(CopTree " ++ show n ++ " _)"
43
44instance B.Name (Cop c) where
45    name = B.name . copName
46
47-- | Name of content operator.
48copName :: Cop c -> S.BlankName
49copName (CopCalc  n _) = n
50copName (CopCox   n _) = n
51copName (CopTree  n _) = n
52
53
54-- ----------------------  Operator name
55
56-- | Name for non-binary operator.
57copNormal :: String -> S.BlankName
58copNormal = S.BlankNormal
59
60-- | Name for program-generated operator.
61copInternal :: String -> S.BlankName
62copInternal = S.BlankInternal
63
64-- | Name for prefix operator.
65copPrefix :: String -> S.BlankName
66copPrefix = S.BlankPrefix
67
68-- | Name for postfix operator.
69copPostfix :: String -> S.BlankName
70copPostfix = S.BlankPostfix
71
72-- | Name for infix operator.
73copInfix :: String -> S.BlankName
74copInfix = S.BlankInfix
75
76
77-- ----------------------  Operator set
78
79-- | Set of content operators.
80data CopSet c = CopSet
81    { copsetCopList    :: [Cop c]
82    , copsetInfixList  :: [(S.Chars, B.InfixHeight)]
83
84    , copsetCalcList   :: [B.Named (Cop c)]  -- ^ CopCalc
85    , copsetCoxList    :: [B.Named (Cop c)]  -- ^ CopCox
86    , copsetTreeList   :: [B.Named (Cop c)]  -- ^ CopTree
87
88    , copsetFindCalc   :: CopFind (D.Cox c)   -- ^ This is created by 'copsetFill'.
89    , copsetFindCox    :: CopFind (CopCox c)  -- ^ This is created by 'copsetFill'.
90    , copsetFindTree   :: CopFind (CopTree S.Chars)  -- ^ This is created by 'copsetFill'.
91
92    , copsetDerived    :: [D.NamedCox c]
93    }
94
95-- | Empty operator set.
96instance B.Default (CopSet c) where
97    def = copset
98
99instance Monoid (CopSet c) where
100    mempty = copset
101    mappend s1 s2 = copsetFill $ copset
102                    { copsetCopList   = appendOn copsetCopList   s1 s2
103                    , copsetInfixList = appendOn copsetInfixList s1 s2
104                    , copsetCalcList  = appendOn copsetCalcList  s1 s2
105                    , copsetCoxList   = appendOn copsetCoxList   s1 s2
106                    , copsetTreeList  = appendOn copsetTreeList  s1 s2
107                    , copsetDerived   = appendOn copsetDerived   s1 s2
108                    }
109
110appendOn :: (a -> [b]) -> a -> a -> [b]
111appendOn f x y = f x ++ f y
112
113-- | Find content operator from its name.
114type CopFind f = S.BlankName -> Maybe f
115
116-- | Empty operator set.
117copset :: CopSet c
118copset = CopSet [] [] [] [] [] O.nothing O.nothing O.nothing []
119
120-- | Complete operator set.
121copsetFill :: O.Map (CopSet c)
122copsetFill opset = opset2 where
123
124    opset2 = opset { copsetFindCalc  =  contFind
125                   , copsetFindCox   =  coxFind
126                   , copsetFindTree  =  treeFind }
127
128    contFind    =  B.assocFinder contList
129    coxFind     =  B.assocFinder coxList
130    treeFind    =  B.assocFinder treeList
131
132    contList    =  B.catMaybes $ map cont cops
133    coxList     =  B.catMaybes $ map cox  cops
134    treeList    =  B.catMaybes $ map tree cops
135
136    cont (CopCalc n f)   =  Just (n, D.CoxCalc [] n f)
137    cont _               =  Nothing
138
139    cox (CopCox n f)     =  Just (n, f)
140    cox _                =  Nothing
141
142    tree (CopTree n f)   =  Just (n, f)
143    tree _               =  Nothing
144
145    cops  = copsetCopList opset
146
147-- | Get set of content operators.
148class GetCops a where
149    getCops :: a c -> CopSet c
150
151instance GetCops CopSet where
152    getCops = id
153
